author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

Change the PPS proton propagation from HECTOR to the official/recommended method using optical functions saved in the condDB.

#### PR validation:
scram b code-checks
scram b code-format
scram b runtests
run with no issues

runTheMatrix.py --job-reports -l limited -i all --ibeos  -- no problems
runTheMatrix.py --job-reports -i all --ibeos -l 11725.0,11925.0  - no problems

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is a backport from #33405. The proton propagation using the approximate optical functions is needed in order to produce any simulation that could be compared to foreseen results.
title: Opt fcn prop 4 113
